_source: speak;Man1;You might have saved Carcino for one more day...|But I fear for our future...|Klimt isn't going to live for that much longer, after all.|Are we just going to have another old, dying man lead us once he is dead?
speak;Man1;Well, we better get our stuff together, or I fear we're not long for this world...
